proj7

Class Salesperson

  • java.lang.Object
    • proj7.Employee
      • proj7.Salesperson
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SalaryConstants

    public final class Salesperson
extends Employee
implements SalaryConstants
    The SalesPerson class inherits all of the data fields from its superclass Employee and also handles its separate data field "sales".

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface proj7.SalaryConstants

        BONUS_RATE, COMMISSION_RATE

      • Salesperson

        public Salesperson(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String address,
                   double salary,
                   int sales)
        Constructor that takes four arguments and assigns them to variables via the super keyword for the name, address and salary data fields. Also assigning the sales variable a value through its set method.
        Parameters:
        name - The employee's full name
        address - The employee's address
        salary - The employee's salary
        sales - The amount of sales made

        public double getAdditionalIncome()
        Description copied from class: Employee
